channel.title: Um, thought i would drop by and say hello... Looking for familiar faces
channel.description: Hi all, most of you probably don't know me, or care to, which is cool. Some of you might remember the name. But mainly just wanted to say hi to old friends, and if you know me say hello, and ask me for my msn or aim. That's about it, laters.

item.title: Um, thought i would drop by and say hello... Looking for familiar faces
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:15, topic:132956”][quote author=Teaspoon link=topic=184220.msg1675602#msg1675602 date=1187156631]
no worries. It’s amazing waffen is still active, he’s my hero and i wub him.
ALso amazing that people still play RS, and even better that these cheating communities still exist.
[/quote]Waffen isn’t very active, he just drops by once a week :P[/quote]

It’s not easy when tree-eating monkies are chasing after you.

Read full topic

item.title: Um, thought i would drop by and say hello... Looking for familiar faces
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Waffendennis, post:4, topic:132956”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=184220.msg1670395#msg1670395 date=1186979821]
Where are we supposed to remember you from? Hi by the way!
[/quote]

You must be joking right :O.
Teaspoon goes way way way back in the cheating scene.

Good to see you back man <3!
I’m sure that people will remember you! :D.[/quote]
My bad, i see alot of topics where people come back and they have only come back from a weeks break.

Glad to see a vet =]

Read full topic

item.title: Um, thought i would drop by and say hello... Looking for familiar faces
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Teaspoon, post:10, topic:132956”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=184220.msg1671157#msg1671157 date=1187003877]
Hmm… Too old school for me, I only joined up at kaitnieks. Don’t remember your name, nice to meet you though.

Join the IRC (irc.moparisthebest.com #mopar) and you may find some older faces (mediator is in there currently, surely you would remember him :P)
[/quote]

Haven’t seen med in ages, he and i are colorado natives
I’ll drop by the irc sometime.[/quote]

MED is DED LOL (original, I know), anyway glad to see oldschoolers.

Read full topic

item.title: Um, thought i would drop by and say hello... Looking for familiar faces
item.dc:creator: @Teaspoon Teaspoon
item.description:
@Teaspoon wrote:

Um, well i was a veteran on RScheatnet, was also known on some other forums, i cant seem to remember them since it was forever ago. Just got to talking to waffen today and he told me this is the cool new place, asked him if anyone there would remember me and he said a few people were still around.

Read full topic
